name: places/ChIJxz1xFQlZwokROiJsQ7PrOIY
formattedAddress: 333 E 38th St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 333 E 38th St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I absolutely LOVE and APPRECIATE Dr. Solitar so much! He is the most responsive, compassionate doctor I've ever had. After being sick for years and seeing dozens of doctors who couldn't diagnose me, Dr. Solitar has been willing to treat me when others weren't. First and foremost, he actually listens to me. He takes immediate steps to run tests and adjust my meds when my symptoms flare, and shows genuine care and concern for me. Many other docs I've seen (including at the Mayo Clinic in MN) were condescending, careless, and insensitive and just tried to get rid of me because my case was too difficult for them to solve. I owe Dr. Solitar my life. The world would be a better place if all doctors were like him.

originalText.text: I've been a patient for over ten years and couldn't imagine being under anyone else's care. Dr. Solitar is an exceptional listener and takes his time to go over every detail of your symptoms to better offer effective treatment. I just love him

text.text: I've been a patient for over ten years and couldn't imagine being under anyone else's care. Dr. Solitar is an exceptional listener and takes his time to go over every detail of your symptoms to better offer effective treatment. I just love him

originalText.text:
Dr Solitar was so compassionate and kind it was like being with your family
He took the time to listen and figure out my pain I have been going through for so long.
His staff is like your extended family
Zoila ,Marianella and  Manusheska were my pilar I think I have no words to describe how I finally felt heard and care in many different level I have so much pain all the time I am confident with anything the doctor seems necessary I might be happy and pain free again
So thank you once again for being the most amazing team a truly amazing  rheumatologist with a A++ staff to make a great!!

originalText.text: I’ll admit, yes, I have had to wait longer than expected my appointments with Dr. Solitar. However his knowledge, compassion, responsiveness, and helpfulness, outweigh the wait time ten fold. For some people, that’s not satisfactory which is OK. But he is what I need in doctor, and I don’t think his tardiness is done intentionally, so I’m willing to forgive that.

originalText.text: This doctor is highly professional, responsive through the patient portal, works as a team with his patients and is very experienced working with fibromyalgia/ chronic fatigue patients. I am so happy to have found him. I can tell he’s very well researched.
